titles.title: National Appeals Division Reform Act of 2001

To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 relating to the National Appeals Division to ensure that agricultural producers and other persons appealing adverse agency decisions of the Department of Agriculture receive fair and equitable treatment, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 2/28/2002--Introduced. National Appeals Division Reform Act of 2001 - Amends the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 respecting the National Appeals Division of the Department of Agriculture to: (1) require an annual report regarding all final determinations and equitable relief requests; (2) prohibit appeal of informal hearing decisions against an agency involving claims of less than $5,000; (3) prohibit agency requests for review of a hearing officer's determination; and (4) provide, upon request, for agency assistance to appellants.
